mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) AS NUMROW, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_CNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 'B01' ) WHERE NUMROW BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_VIEWCNT, BOARD_CREATEDDATETIME, BOARD_UPDATEDDATETIME, BOARD_DELETEDDATETIME, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_NO, BOARD_ID, FROM BOARD
